name: @dev-luch/ses-pilot
description: A CLI tool to manage AWS SES email templates. (Dev Luch AWS SES Manager)

scripts.copy:web: node -e "const fs=require('fs-extra'); fs.ensureDirSync('dist/web'); fs.copySync('src/web/.next', 'dist/web/.next'); fs.copySync('src/web/public', 'dist/web/public'); fs.copyFileSync('src/web/next.config.ts', 'dist/web/next.config.js'); fs.copyFileSync('src/web/package.json', 'dist/web/package.json');"
scripts.optimize:web: node -e "const fs=require('fs-extra'); const path=require('path'); const distWeb='dist/web/.next'; if(fs.existsSync(distWeb+'/cache')) fs.removeSync(distWeb+'/cache'); if(fs.existsSync(distWeb+'/build')) { const buildFiles=fs.readdirSync(distWeb+'/build/chunks').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.map')); buildFiles.forEach(f=>fs.removeSync(path.join(distWeb+'/build/chunks',f))); } const serverChunks=distWeb+'/server/chunks'; if(fs.existsSync(serverChunks)) { fs.readdirSync(serverChunks,{recursive:true}).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.map')).forEach(f=>fs.removeSync(path.join(serverChunks,f))); }"
scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run build:web && npm run copy:web && npm run optimize:web
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: dev-luch
